basicInfo.desc: This Task executes and transforms a Report with the style supplied by the caller.

parameter.name: styleName
parameter.desc: The style to use to transform the ReportBean. If omitted, a simple MessageResult is generated.

parameter.name: reportViewMode
parameter.desc: The Report's view mode. See EnumReportViewModes for details.

parameter.name: resultFlags
parameter.desc: The result flags to use. See EnumDSSXMLResultFlags for details.

parameter.name: msgID
parameter.desc: The Message ID of a previously executed Report.

parameter.name: reportID
parameter.desc: The object ID of the Report to execute.

parameter.name: execFlags
parameter.desc: The execution flags to use. See EnumDSSXMLExecutionFlags for details.

parameter.name: maxRows
parameter.desc: The report's maximum number of rows to get

parameter.name: maxCols
parameter.desc: The report's maximum number of columns to get

parameter.name: originMessageID
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the prompt answers using the previous message ID

parameter.name: promptsAnswerXML
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the prompt answers using the prompt answer xml

parameter.name: elementsPromptAnswers
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the answers for the element prompts

parameter.name: valuePromptAnswers
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the answers for the value prompts

parameter.name: objectsPromptAnswers
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the answers for the object prompts

parameter.name: linkAnswers
parameter.desc: The parameter to specify the answers for the prompts using the link Answers

parameter.name: includeOptimizedDrillPathSetting
parameter.desc: The parameter to update the result2Flags for drilling

parameter.name: includeImageMapsSetting
parameter.desc: The parameter to update the result2Flags for image maps

parameter.name: doNotUpdateCaches
parameter.desc: Whether not to update the server caches
